title: The game cant' t be launched!
body: Few weeks ago i had installed the game but i uninstalled it. Today i reinstalled it but the game just can't be launched and i think it,s about the problem of client. Anyone can help?

replies.body: Are you getting any errors when trying to launch the patcher?  What are you seeing exactly and when?

Sorry to intercept you like this but I think me and them are having the same problem. If I'm right the client won't launch at all. When I try to launch it I get the loading screen indefinitely. I just had this problem today and have tried restarting my PC and everything. 

I don't know if it has anything to do Wooxy because I downloaded it to use custom skins but I'm not sure it would.

To better understand, what do you mean exactly by loading screen if aren't able to get into the client?  What is loading indefinitely?  Do you have any screenshots?  Using third party programs are risky, and likely to cause you issues.  Before anything else, your best bet is to remove any third party programs for a fresh slate as the fastest way to rule out possibilities.

Sorry don't know how to post screen shots here. You know when you click the launcher and you get the black screen with the lol logo in the middle with the blue trail circling it? It just gets stuck there and doesn't move. I uninstalled Wooxy and restarted my computer and it didn't change anything.

Is this on the updated client?  What happens if you try the legacy version:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Black screens usually indicate a connection problem because it can't download assets, but because of everything your client has gone through there could be other issues causing it.

Actually I'm curious about your job. Is it something that's done virtually? That someone could do on the move? I'm 18 and in college looking for work. Would this be something I could do from my home device?

Hi again. I got the problem again this morning so after restarting my computer a couple of times it loaded. I switched back to the legacy client and haven't had the problem all die. Just reporting to see if that might be a problem worth looking into.

The issue occurs when I first launch so it doesn't actually get to the login screen. I did launch the old LoL Patcher but when I first did that it just tried to take me back to the new client. Now when I click launch it just freezes.

did you fixed your client?
if not try this-C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\0.0.1.236 and delete (releasemanifest,S_OK)files.

okay so the game started trying to launch randomnly without my input and I shut off my computer. After restarting it worked again. Not quite sure what happened or whether or not thats my pc or league. Thanks for helping me even though this wasn't my thread. I'll update you if anything happens again if that's fine with you. Have a great day.
